name: No Mind
description:
Background:

You are an interrogator trying to get information out of convicts about the crimes they have committed before the hearing at their trial, listen to their stories, engage in the conversation, find out what all you can, and use various tactics to persuade or press the information out of them.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Choose Left Option

Right Mouse Button - Choose Right Option

Credits:

Frazier Kyle - Programming Lead

Dylan Fall - Music and Writing

LLCoolSmith - Art

Stella Kinoshita - Art and Writing

TJ - Ideas

Trey Poling - Ideas

Justin Klein - Attendance Bot

Miami Game Design Club 2022
